description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5op77","text":"The purpose of this protocol is to visualize gene expression in single cells by targeting the mRNA of genes of interest using HCR-FISH v3.0. This protocol is specific to imaging mRNA within multicellular aggregates of anaerobic methanotrophic archaea (ANME) and sulfate reducing bacteria (SRB), separated from marine sediment samples. It can be used directly for imaging large cells in marine sediment cells or for smaller cells by changing the pore size of the polycarbonate filter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working but it is very dependent on the targeted gene. Some genes, especially longer genes just make better targets.

steps.section: Density separation of ANME-SRB aggregates from sediment
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4242n","text":"Allow tube to cool on ice, and sonicate using the sonication wand for  , three times. Allow   rest between each cycle of sonication. Rinse the wand with nanopure water and wipe clean with a Kim Wipe before using for the next sample. (Sonication disrupts sediment-attached cells from sediment particles.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":92,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Preparation of filters containing density-separated ANME-SRB aggregates
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5u54q","text":"Use tweezers to take a 5 µm PVDF backing filter (EMD Millipore), dip it in nanopure water and place on the glass frit. Add the measuring glass filter tower on top of the polycarbonate filter and clamp down with the silver clamp. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1b47a","text":"Allow the filter to air-dry in the dark and mount on a glass slide with    of DAPI:citifluor and cover with a 25x25 mm cover slip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24o57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"25","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
